properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ENQUIRY JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT * FROM ENQUIRY ORDER BY ENQUIRY_NO DESC)A) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT ENQUIRY_NO ,ENQUIRY_TITLE , ENQUIRY_CONTENT , PARENT_ENQUIRY, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT , 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" ' ) CREATE_DT FROM ENQUIRY WHERE ENQUIRY_NO = ?
